statusText.perText: Higher CPU usage, Higher fan speed
statusText.quietText: Lower CPU usage, Lower fan speed

statusText.gamingText: CPU Overclocking will be activated automatically while game launches

popup.text: Change will be effective after restarting computer.

driverPopup.text: You need install driver for RAM Overclock to  make it effective

legionEdgeModal.line1:
With Vantage Edge, your settings will be automatically tuned based on usage. 
 Maximum performance when gaming, longer battery life when you're not.
legionEdgeModal.line2:
Feature Management Overview
Some features not available on all devices
legionEdgeModal.line3:
CPU Overclocking
Boost the maximum speed for your processor
legionEdgeModal.line4:
RAM Overclocking
Boost the maximum speed for your memory
legionEdgeModal.line5:
Network Boost
Prioritize network traffic for the game you're playing
legionEdgeModal.line6:
Dolby
Tune your audio specifically for gaming with Dolby technology
legionEdgeModal.line7:
Hybrid Mode
Disable advanced GPU settings when not gaming to boost battery performance
legionEdgeModal.line8:
Rapid Charge
Game on the go longer with quicker battery charging
legionEdgeModal.line9:
Touchpad Lock
Prevent mistaken inputs by disabling the touchpad while gaming
legionEdgeModal.line10:
Auto Close
Clear processes that are not needed for gaming before you start playing to maximize available system resources
legionEdgeModal.line11:
Thermal Mode
Set your preferred device profile for fan speed and cooling control

systemInfo.systenTooltip: Hover on CPU/GPU/RAM and different drives to show their descriptions including manufature and model info

macroKey.title: Macro Key
macroKey.introLine: You can record a series of key input, and use them in gaming or other operations.

whileGaming.title: Macro Key enabled only when gaming
whileGaming.description: It will be enabled when you game and remain as num key when you don't.

intro.title: CREATE A MACRO KEY FOR
intro.line1: click the start recording button below

recording.title: START TYPING
recording.description: 20 inputs with in 20 seconds can be recorded.

keep.title: Keep Delay
keep.description: Intervals of key actions will be kept and applied when using this macro key.

ignore.title: Ignore Delay
ignore.description: Intervals of key actions will be ignored.

clearMacrokey.title: Are you sure to clear this macro key?

timeoutRecording.title: Time Out For Recording.
timeoutRecording.body: Recording will time out if no input for 20 seconds.

maximumInput.title: Maximum Input Reached.
maximumInput.body: Macro key can only store inputs less than 20.

inputStopped.title: Time Out For Recording.
inputStopped.body: Recording will time out if the input stopped for more than 10 seconds.

tutorial.para2: Before we can give you the most optimal experience there are still a few things to setup.

systemStatus.title: System Status
systemStatus.subtitle: QUICK CATCH UP YOUR DEVICE STATUS.

Illegal.title: This system may not support battery that
Illegal.description: is not genuine Lenovo-made or authorized. The system will continue to boot, but may not charge with unauthorized batteries.
Illegal.description2: Lenovo has no responsibility for the performance or safety of unauthorized batteries, and provides no warranties for failures or damage arising out of their use.

Good.title: The battery is in good Condition

Exhaustion.title: The battery has failed due to normal
Exhaustion.description: wear. The battery cannot be charged. Replace the battery.

Bad.title: A battery error has occurred.
Bad.description: The battery cannot be charged/discharged . Replace the battery.

NotGood.title: The battery is not in a good Condition

ACAdapterNotSupported.title: AC adapter not supported.
ACAdapterNotSupported.description: Your Lenovo computer doesn't support this AC adapter. It may cause sudden shutdown.Please connect a correct AC adapter

EnoughPowerACAdapter.title: AC adapter cannot provide enough power
EnoughPowerACAdapter.description: to your Lenovo computer that will impact system performance and charging speed. Please reconnect the proper AC adapter.

MissingDriver.title: The Lenovo Power Manager Driver is not installed or not working properly. Please run Windows Update to install the latest driver
MissingDriver.description: is not installed or not working properly. Please run Windows Update to install the latest driver

power.title: Napajanje
power.subtitle: Postavke napajanja
power.description: Ovaj odjeljak omogućava vam da dinamički podesite termičku učinkovitost i povećate trajanje baterije.Također ima druge popularne značajke povezane s napajanjem. U ovom odjeljku možete provjeriti zadane postavke i prilagoditi sustav svojim potrebama.

powerSmartSettings.title: Pametne postavke napajanja
powerSmartSettings.subtitle: PAMETNO HLAĐENJE
powerSmartSettings.description1: Ta značajka automatski prilagođava termičke postavke prema vašim potrebama.
powerSmartSettings.description2: Pametno hlađenje podešava brzinu ventilatora, maksimalnu temperaturu površine i performanse.Ta značajka ima načine rada navedene u nastavku i sada je dostupna u klizaču za performanse napajanja sustava Windows.
powerSmartSettings.description3: Pametno hlađenje automatski usklađuje toplinske performanse s vašim potrebama.Značajka pametnog hlađenja podešava postavke performansi kako bi vam pružila hladniju površinu radi ugodnijeg korištenja pri držanju prijenosnog računala.

gotoWindows.title: Idite na postavke sustava Windows
gotoWindows.modalBodyText1: Kliknite na ikonu baterije sustava Windows na traci sustava kako biste pristupili klizaču za performanse napajanja sustava Windows

intelligentCooling.title: Pametno hlađenje
intelligentCooling.apsHint: Da biste omogućili pametno hlađenje, morate instalirati i omogućiti Lenovo Active Protection System.

readMore.line2: Klizač je u sredini.Brzina ventilatora i performanse dinamički su uravnotežene za najbolje iskustvo.
readMore.line3: Klizač je krajnje desno. Brzina ventilatora i dopuštena temperatura površine povećani su za najbolje performanse.

selectedModeText.quiteCool: This mode enables the best experience with fan speed and system performance balanced. For example, when in gaming, it optimizes the performance. While in the office, it reduces the noise.
selectedModeText.batterySaving: This mode enables the maximum battery life by automatically adjusting the brightness, changing the power settings, disabling features on advanced image processing, etc.
selectedModeText.performance: This mode enables the maximum system performance. In this mode, the fast fan speed might cause big noise.

powerSmartSettings.description14: This feature enables you to adjust your fan speed, maximize the system performance, or extend your battery life if needed. It has three modes below. You also can switch the modes using hotkeys (Fn+Q) or from Lenovo Vantage Toolbar.

alwaysUSB.title: Always on USB
alwaysUSB.description: USB uređaje punite putem uvijek uključenog USB priključka na računalu kada je računalo u stanju mirovanja ili hibernacije, odnosno kada je isključeno.Pametni telefon ili tablet mogu se brzo napuniti s pomoću USB priključka koji je označen žutom bojom ili označen tehnikom sitotiska ovim ikonama:
alwaysUSB.checkbox: Omogući USB punjenje s baterije prijenosnog računala kada je računalo isključeno.

easyResume.title: Easy Resume
easyResume.description: Enable this feature to improve your resume time if you frequently open and close your computer's lid.
easyResume.tooltip: This feature will improve your resume time if you frequently open and close your computer’s lid. When enabled, your computer will enter a low power mode when you close its lid, but it will resume instantly if you reopen your lid within 15 minutes of closing it. This feature also allows your notebook to attempt to finish pending activities (such as sending email or downloading a file) before the system goes into suspend.

vantageToolbar.title: Alatna traka za Lenovo Vantage
vantageToolbar.description: Pričvrstite alatnu traku Vantage na programsku traku sustava Windows kako biste jednostavnije dobili pojedinosti o bateriji i pristup brzim postavkama.

batteryThreshold.title: Prag punjenja baterije
batteryThreshold.description: Ako se računalom prvenstveno koristite dok je priključeno na prilagodnik izmjeničnog napona te se rijetko koristite napajanjem baterije,možete povećati životni vijek baterije tako da vrijednost maksimalnog punjenja postavite na manje od 100 %. To je korisno zato što će baterije koje se rijetko koriste dulje trajati ako se drže tek djelomično napunjene.
batteryThreshold.tooltip: Ako je baterija trenutačno napunjena iznad praga za zaustavljanje punjenja, odvojite napajanje dok se baterija ne isprazni na prag za zaustavljanje punjenja ili ispod njega.
batteryThreshold.noteInfo: Battery Charge Threshold is still not fully active. Please unplug your machine and allow your battery to drain to or below the stop-charging threshold.

popup.title: Omogući prag punjenja baterije
popup.description1: Omogućivanje prilagođenog punjenja baterije omogućit će dulje sveukupno trajanje baterije dok koristite ovaj uređaj.
popup.description2: Kako biste u potpunosti omogućili tu značajku, odspojite uređaj ipustite da se baterija isprazni na prag za zaustavljanje punjenja ili ispod njega.

options.checkboxText: Automatically set the start charging threshold 5 percentage points below the stop charging threshold.

expressCharging.title: Brzo punjenje
expressCharging.description: Brzo punjenje omogućava bateriji da se u potpunosti napuni brže nego u uobičajenom načinu rada.
expressCharging.tooltip: Brzo punjenje omogućava vam da brže napunite bateriju sustava,ali to može smanjiti vijek trajanja baterije.

conservationMode.title: Način uštede napajanja
conservationMode.description: Ova je funkcija korisna za produljenje vijeka trajanja baterije kada je priključena.

tooltip.line1: Ova je funkcija korisna za produljenje vijeka trajanja baterije kada je priključena.
tooltip.line2: Kada je omogućen ovaj način rada, baterija će se napuniti samo do 55 - 60 % kapaciteta, a vijek trajanja baterije može se maksimalno povećati.
tooltip.line3: Napomena: način brzog punjenja i način uštede energije ne mogu istodobno raditi.

airPlanePower.title: Način napajanja u zrakoplovu
airPlanePower.description: Kontrolom utroška energije sustava štitite naponsku utičnicu u zrakoplovu.

audio.title: Zvuk
audio.subtitle: Postavke zvuka
audio.description: U ovom odjeljku možete automatski optimizirati ili u potpunosti

audioSmartsettings.title: Pametne postavke zvuka
audioSmartsettings.subtitle: POSTAVKE UTEMELJENE NA APLIKACIJI
audioSmartsettings.description: Automatski podesite postavke zvuka na temelju različitih aplikacija kojim se koristite.

dolby.title: Automatske postavke Dolby zvuka
dolby.tooltip: Automatske postavke Dolby Audio zvuka podešavaju postavke zvuka Dolby naodgovarajući način rada za različite aplikacije kojim se koristite kako bi poboljšale doživljaj zvuka.

voip.title: Automatska optimizacija zvuka za VoIP
voip.tooltip: Automatski se prebacite na način rada Dolby Voice tijekom VoIP poziva kako bi se dobila jasna, dosljedna kvaliteta glasa.

note.title: napomena
note.description: Lenovo Vantage nema dozvolu za pristup mikrofonu.Omogućite aplikaciji Lenovo Vantage pristup mikrofonu.

microphone.title: Mikrofon
microphone.tooltip: Možete prilagoditi MIC efekt podešavanjem glasnoće mikrofonai naznačiti odgovarajući način rada.

volume.title: Microphone Volume
volume.description: Dolby Audio delivers rich, clear, powerful sound from all the content you enjoy, select appropriate mode for your content and equipment.

suppress.title: Suppress keyboard noise
suppress.tooltip: Toggle this on to optimize the MIC audio by suppressing keyboard noise.

acoustic.title: Acoustic Echo Cancellation
acoustic.tooltip: Toggle on this feature to optimize your MIC audio by reducing acoustic echo.

optimize.title: Optimize my microphone for:
optimize.tooltip: Configure microphone effect to enhance your audio experience by different scenarios and environment.

displayCamera.title: Prikaz i kamera
displayCamera.subtitle: Postavke prikaza i kamere
displayCamera.description: Ovaj odjeljak omogućava vam da poboljšate vizualni doživljaj i prilagodite svojstva kamere.Istražite više značajki i prilagodite doživljaj prikaza ovdje.

eyeCareMode.title: Način rada ugodan za oči
eyeCareMode.checkbox: Zakažite način rada ugodan za oči od zalaska do izlaska sunca
eyeCareMode.tooltip: Način rada ugodan za oči prilagođava temperaturu boje prikaza kako bi filtrirao plavu svjetlost i smanjio naprezanje očiju.
eyeCareMode.onSunsetToSunriseScheduleDescription: Zakažite način rada ugodan za oči od zalaska do izlaska sunca

note.title: Napomena
note.description: Lenovo Vantage mora pristupiti informacijama o lokaciji kako bi izračunao vrijeme zalaska i izlaska sunca u vašoj regiji.

dispColorTemp.title: Daytime color temperature
dispColorTemp.tooltip: Eye Care Mode adjusts the color temperature of your display to filter out blue light and reduce eye strain.
dispColorTemp.onSunsetToSunriseScheduleDescription: Schedule eye care mode from sunset to sunrise

note.title: Note
note.description: When the Eye care mode is enabled. this color temperature does not take effect. However,  you can drag the slide to get a preview of it. To make it effective. turn off the Eye care mode

privacyGuard.title: Privacy guard
privacyGuard.description: This feature prevents other people from peeking at your screen. When on, it changes the viewing angle of your display, keeping it private from those around you. You also can toggle modes by pressing the "Fn+D" keys.
privacyGuard.note: Privacy Guard does not work in screen portrait mode. In this mode, your screen is still visible from the sides.
privacyGuard.labelText: Enable this feature when typing passwords

oledPowerSettings.title: OLED Power Settings
description: Your computer's OLED display can also reduce power consumption and increase battery life by selectively dimming portions of the display.
It is also recommended to dim the task bar and other areas of the display that do not change frequently to prolong the overall lifetime of the display.
oledPowerSettings.tooltip: This feature can reduce power consumption and increase battery life by selectively dimming portions of the display.

camera.title: Kamera

note.title: Napomena
note.description: Lenovo Vantage nema dozvole za pristup kameri.Omogućite aplikaciji Lenovo Vantage pristup kameri.

camera.url: Idite na postavke privatnosti sustava Windows

cameraPrivacy.title: Način privatnosti kamere
cameraPrivacy.tooltip: Kada je omogućena postavka privatnosti, kamera prestaje slati slike uživo. Tu postavku uključite samo kad ne želite svoju sliku slati drugima tijekom videopoziva.

camera.title: Kamera
camera.tooltip: Kliknite ovdje kako biste vratili svojstva Kamere na zadane postavke.

camerablur.title: Zamagljenje pozadine kamere
camerablur.caption: Ova značajka zamagljuje pozadinu kada se koristite kamerom za videopoziv ili fotografiranje.Možete odabrati različite efekte iz odabira u nastavku.

smartAssist.title: Smart Assist
smartAssist.description: Pametni senzori tvrtke Lenovo kombiniraju senzore na računalu kako bi otkrili vaše aktivnosti,prilagodili postavke za optimalno upravljanje potrošnjom energije i zaštitili vašu privatnost.

HumanPresenceDetection.title: Otkrivanje ljudske prisutnosti
HumanPresenceDetection.tooltip: Kliknite ovdje kako biste ponovno postavili postavke otkrivanja ljudske prisutnosti.

humanPresenceDetection.title: User Presence Sensing
humanPresenceDetection.tooltip: Click here to reset human presence Detection settings.

zeroTouchLogin.title: Prijava Zero Touch
zeroTouchLogin.caption: Ta značajka automatski otključava računalo ili ga vraća iz stanja mirovanja kada stojite ispred njega ili mu se približavate.

zeroTouchLock.title: Zaključavanje Zero Touch
zeroTouchLock.caption: Ta značajka zatamnjuje zaslon i zaključava računalo kada se ne otkrije prisutnost korisnika.Može smanjiti vjerojatnost neovlaštenog pristupa računalu kada ga ostavite bez nadzora ili otključanog. Također smanjuje potrošnju energije tako što sustav prebacuje u moderno stanje mirovanja kada nije otkrivena vaša prisutnost.

autoScreenLockTimer.title: AUTOMATSKI MJERAČ ZA ZAKLJUČAVANJE ZASLONA
autoScreenLockTimer.toolTipContent: Odaberite željenu opciju za zaključavanje zaslona na brzini Brzo/Srednje/Sporo kada nije otkrivena vaša prisutnost.

distanceSensitivityAdjusting.title: DISTANCE SENSITIVITY ADJUSTING
distanceSensitivityAdjusting.caption: Automatsko podešavanje osjetljivosti udaljenosti automatski će ažuriratiosjetljivost udaljenosti putem modula za umjetnu inteligenciju.

note.description1: Ta značajka oslanja se na Windows Hello.Pobrinite se da je prepoznavanje lica uključeno u postavkama sustava Windows.
note.description2: Ta značajka koristi se senzorima i kamerom kako bi otkrila vašu prisutnost.
note.description3: 1. Ako je vaše računalo u načinu rada šatora, tableta ili stajaćem načinu,te značajke možda neće ispravno raditi.
note.description4: 2. Ako je računalo u stanju hibernacije ili je isključeno.Automatska prijava IC kamere neće funkcionirati.
note.description5: 3. Podesite zaslon računala tako da bude pod odgovarajućim kutomtako da IC kamera može prepoznati vaše lice radi automatske prijave.

WindowsLink.goToWindowsHello: Idite na postavke sustava Windows Hello
WindowsLink.screenTimeoutSettings: Idi na postavke isteka vremena za zaslon

intelligentScreen.title: Intelligent Screen
intelligentScreen.description: Lenovo Intelligent Sensing combines the various sensors on your computer to detect your activities and adjust settings for power management. For example, it will dim your display if it detects you are walking but will not dim it if it detects you reading.

autoScreenOff.title: Auto screen off
autoScreenOff.caption: Automatically turn off display when face-down or walking.
autoScreenOff.note: This feature is not available if your Power Plan settings are set to "never turn off the screen on battery " in the Windows Settings "System section". Please select a value other than "Never" to enable this feature.
autoScreenOff.windowsLink: Go to Power & sleep settings in Windows settings

keepMyDisplay.title: Keep my display
keepMyDisplay.caption: Keep my display when I am reading or browsing.

displaySlider.title: Minutes Before display dims when browsing

intelligentMedia.heading: Intelligent Media
intelligentMedia.title: Zero Touch Video Playback
intelligentMedia.desc: This feature will pause the video when you are leaving the computer and resume the video when you are back.
intelligentMedia.tooltip: This feature is not applicable to Web video players. Popular local video players, such as Windows Media Player, 5KPlayer, and etc. support this feature.

popup.rebootForceMsg: Ažuriranja koja ste odabrali prouzročit će da se sustav automatski ponovno pokrenenakon instalacije.
popup.shutdownForceMsg: Ažuriranja koja ste odabrali prouzročit će da se sustav automatski isključinakon instalacije.
popup.rebootDelayedMsg: Ažuriranja koja ste odabrali prouzročit će ponovno pokretanje sustava nakon instalacije,
popup.rebootRequiredMsg: Kako biste uspješno instalirali ažuriranja, vašem računalu trebaponovno pokretanje kako bi se osiguralo da sve funkcionira sigurno i glatko.

critical.title: Ključna ažuriranja
critical.tooltip: Kritična ažuriranja mogu spriječiti značajne probleme,

recommended.title: 推荐更新
recommended.tooltip: 推荐的驱动程序更新使计算机运行保持最佳性能。

banner.title: Ažurirani sustav je zdrav sustav.
banner.next: Sljedeći ažurirani pregled zakazan je za
banner.description: Ti paketi sadržavaju ažuriranja za upravljačke programe za hardver iostale uslužne programe sustava koji su ključni za ispravan rad računala. Kritička ažuriranja važna su i za zaštitu podataka na računalu i trebala bi se instalirati čim postanu dostupna.

fail.title: Neka ažuriranja nisu ispravno instalirana.
fail.description: Došlo je do problema tijekom preuzimanja ili instalacije tih ažuriranja.Pobrinite se da ste na mreži i ne isključujte računalo tijekom instaliranja ažuriranja.

updateCheckbox.failReason: Fail reason: The ac power adapter was not connected to your computer.

availableUpdates.title: Available updates
availableUpdates.description: These packages include updates that are critical for the correct operation of your computer. Critical updates help keep your computer more secure and reliable and should be installed as they become available. Recommended updates and optional updates help keep your software up to date and your computer running at its best.
availableUpdates.installFailHeader: Some updates were not installed correctly
availableUpdates.installFailDescription: Something went wrong during the downloading and installation of these updates. Please make sure you are online and don't turn off your computer when installing updates.

homeSecurity.title: Connected Home Security
homeSecurity.trailExpiredSubtext: Upgrate to protect all of your devices

tour.welcomeDesc1: In just a few clicks you’ll be able to protect PCs, mobile devices, and connected devices for you and your family. Start your free 30 day trial now.
tour.welcomeDesc2: Connected Home Security is built directly in to Vantage for quick access to the protection status of your ecosystem and security alerts.
tour.monitor: Monitor the safety of your family's devices
tour.peaceOfMind: Get peace of mind that you are protected at all times!
tour.alreadyHave: I already have a Connected Home Security Account
tour.locationPermission: In order for this feature to function correctly you will need to enable location tracking for this device

warranty.subDescription1: Ovaj proizvod ima godinama ograničeno jamstvo i ima pravo na uslugu popravka u skladištu. Korisnici mogu nazvati svoj lokalni servisni centar za više informacija. Trgovci mogu pružati popravak za ovaj proizvod.
warranty.subDescription2: Nismo mogli locirati podatke o jamstvu za vaš uređaj. Za više mogućnosti jamstva posjetite naše web-mjesto za podršku.

needHelp.title: Trebate li pomoć?
needHelp.weChatDescription: Pošaljite nam pitanje na WeChat i svakako ćemo brzo odgovoriti

quickAccess.categoriesDesc: Find helpful information in our articles

landing.notFullyDesc: Niste u potpunosti zaštićeni. Saznajte kako se bolje zaštititi.
landing.maliciousNetwork: Vaše računalo ovaj je mjesec spriječeno pri priključivanju {{maliciousWifi}} zlonamjernim mrežama.
landing.subTitleOffline: Learn more on how to solve connection issues in our

common.title: Zaštita od virusa
common.recommends: Lenovo za zaštitu svih uređaja preporučuje McAfee sa sljedećim značajkama:
common.award: Nagrađivana zaštita od najnovijih prijetnji, uključujući ucjenjivački i zlonamjerni softver
common.dedicated: Namjenska zaštita koja je dosljedno bolja od programa Defender i drugih vodećih pružatelja zaštite od virusa
common.deviceToCloud: Tehnologija prijenosa s uređaja u oblak koja ne usporava vaš PC
common.privacyTerms: Pročitajte više o <tag>Pravilniku o zaštiti privatnosti</tag> i <tag>Uvjetima pružanja usluge</tag>
common.protectedBy: Trenutno vas štiti {{protectedName}}. Međutim, McAfee LiveSafe bi vam mogao pružiti bolju zaštitu.

windowsDefender.subtitle: Trenutačno vas štiti Windows Defender.Međutim, mogli biste biti bolje zaštićeni s pomoću programa McAfee LiveSafe. Saznajte više u nastavku.
windowsDefender.windowsProtected: Osnovna zaštita s pomoću programa Windows Defender
windowsDefender.windowsSubtitle: Program Windows defender pruža osnovnu zaštitu za vaš uređaj

mcafee.title: McAfee LiveSafe
mcafee.subtitle: Trenutačno vas štiti McAfee LiveSafe
mcafee.awardSubtitle: Blokira viruse, zlonamjerne, ucjenjivačke, špijunske i neželjene programe te više na vašem računalu.
mcafee.encryptedSubtitle: Čuvajte osjetljive datoteke njihovim pohranjivanjem na računalo sa 128-bitnim šifriranjem.
mcafee.identitySubtitle: Preuzmite odgovornost za zaštitu svojeg identiteta od krađe i prijevare.
mcafee.supportSubtitle: Pruža pokrivenost telefonom, razgovorom ili putem interneta tijekom trajanja pretplate.
mcafee.antiSubtitle: Blokira opasne poruke prije nego što dođu u vašu ulaznu poštu uklanjanjem poruka e-pošte koje mogu obuhvaćati rizične veze i viruse.
mcafee.virusSubtitle: Ako se računalo zarazi virusom, stručnjak tvrtke McAfee daljinski će pristupiti računalu i ukloniti virus.
mcafee.parentalSubtitle: Blokirajte web-mjesta i rezultate pretraživanja koja ne želite da ih vaša djeca vide. Omogućuje vam i postavljanje vremenskog ograničenja korištenja interneta.

container.title: Sigurnost WiFija tvrtke Lenovo
container.name: SIGURNOST WIFI MREŽE
container.disableDecribe: Sigurnost WiFija tvrtke Lenovo napredna je softverska usluga u oblaku koja vašem uređaju pojednostavnjuje razlikovanje sigurnih bežičnih veza od potencijalno zlonamjernih.

threatlocator.describe: Upotrijebite alat za lociranje prijetnji da biste utvrdili sigurnost mreža koje su vam dostupne.
threatlocator.tryAgain: Nismo u mogućnosti locirati prijetnju uslijed nedostupnosti mreže, povežite se na Internet i pokušajte iznova.

locationmodal.title: Omogući lokacijske usluge
locationmodal.describe1: Da biste upotrijebili značajku Sigurnost WiFi mreže tvrtke Lenovo, morate omogućiti lokacijske usluge za Lenovo Vantage. Želite li sad omogućiti lokacijske usluge?
locationmodal.describe2: Da biste upotrijebili značajku povezane sigurnosti doma, morate omogućiti lokacijske usluge za Lenovo Vantage. Želite li sad omogućiti lokacijske usluge?

homesecurity.title: Povezana sigurnost doma
homesecurity.titleDescription: Povezana sigurnost doma čuva vas na tri načina:
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect1: povezana sigurnost doma osigurava da je vaš uređaj siguran i da nije ugrožen;
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect2: povezana sigurnost doma osigurava da su mreže s kojima ste povezani sigurne;
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect3: povezana sigurnost doma osigurava da su ostali uređaji koji su povezani s vašom kućnom mrežom sigurni.
homesecurity.describe: Nesigurni uređaji i mreže mogu uvesti zlonamjerni softver, dovesti do krađe identiteta te curenja privatnih i financijskih informacija. Omogućite tu značajku da biste smanjili rizik od izloženosti svojeg uređaja i kućne mreže napadačima
homesecurity.subtitle: Bezbrižan rad
homesecurity.subtitleDescribe: Povezana sigurnost doma poslat će vam upozorenje ako otkrije ranjivost na vašem uređaju ili kućnoj mreži ili ako ste povezani s potencijalno zlonamjernom mrežom. Saznajte još više o povezanoj kućnoj sigurnosti u Savjetima i trikovima.

invitationcode.buttonDescribe: Ovaj ste uređaj već priključili na postojeći korisnički račun povezane kućne sigurnosti.
invitationcode.title: Već imate povezanu kućnu sigurnost?
invitationcode.titleDescribe: Provjerite jesu li dozvole za lokaciju omogućene za Vantage kako biste svoj uređaj dodali na postojeći korisnički račun kućne povezanosti i upotrijebili povezanu kućnu sigurnost.
invitationcode.canUse: Sada možete započeti s upotrebom povezane kućne sigurnosti

securityhealth.title: Stanje sigurnosti

vpn.title: Sigurnost VPN mreže
vpn.whatIsSufEasy: SurfEasy VPN šifrira informacije koje šaljete i primate tako da možete sigurno i privatno upotrebljavati svoje osobno računalo, Mac®, pametni telefon ili tablet na bilo kojoj internetskoj vezi bez brige.
vpn.whatCanSufEasy1: A virtual private network provider that protects you while you are online. Without a VPN, your computer may be more vulnerable to attackers and identity theft. The VPN runs silently in the background and provides security and privacy protection.
vpn.startUseSufEasy4: SurfEasy users can enjoy 250 MB of free traffic every 30 days! Follow the steps on the "Rewards" tab of the SurfEasy app to get more traffic.
vpn.howToGetData1: Confirm email to win +250 MB traffic
vpn.howToGetData2: Add a second device to win +250 MB of traffic
vpn.howToGetData3: Refer a friend and win +500 MB of traffic
vpn.howToGetData4: Like SurfEasy on Facebook, earn +100 MB of traffic,
vpn.howToGetData5: Follow SurfEasy on Twitter and win +100 MB of traffic
vpn.helpKeep: S pomoću SurfEasy VPN mreže čuvajte sigurnost i privatnost vaših aktivnosti na internetu.
vpn.whySufEasyDescription: Upotreba Wi-Fi pristupnih točaka, kao što su one u kafićima ili zračnim lukama, može dovesti do izlaganja osjetljivih informacija kiberkriminalcima. SurfEasy VPN je VPN mreža bez zapisnika koja šifrira vaše osobne podatke i ne prati ili pohranjuje vašu internetsku aktivnost ili lokaciju.
vpn.startUseSufEasy: Već se danas počnite koristiti SurfEasy mrežom
vpn.startUseSufEasy1: Pomozite osigurati da su podaci koje šaljete i primate sigurni i privatni uz šifriranje bankovne razine.
vpn.startUseSufEasy2: Spriječite da tvrtke prate vaše internetske aktivnosti ili lokaciju.
vpn.startUseSufEasy3: Besplatne i vrhunske ponude pružaju više mogućnosti koje odgovaraju vašim potrebama i proračunu.
vpn.whatCanSufEasy2: Zaštitite svoju privatnost i uključite SurfEasy VPN tijekom pristupa javnoj Wi-Fi pristupnoj točki. S planom Lenovo Starter VPN možete ispuniti nagradne aktivnosti da biste zaradili više propusnosti za zaštitu podataka. Nadogradite da biste zaštitili do 5 pametnih telefona, tableta i računala s neograničenom propusnosti.
vpn.getStarted1: Kliknite iznad na gumb "Otvori SurfEasy" da biste pokrenuli SurfEasy VPN.
vpn.getStarted2: Uključite VPN i pričekajte trenutak na potvrdu sigurne veze.
vpn.getStarted3: Promijenite regiju ili lokaciju ako želite i uživajte u sigurnoj, privatnoj mreži.
vpn.privacyPolicyAndTermsOfService: Pročitajte više o <tag>Pravilniku o zaštiti privatnosti</tag> i <tag>Uvjetima pružanja usluge</tag>

passwordManager.title: Jačina lozinke
passwordManager.whatIsPmNotInstalled: Najsigurniji, najlakši način za spremanje jakih, složenih lozinki i brzu prijavu na svaku stranicu.
passwordManager.whatIsPmInstalled: Sigurniji digitalni život čeka: dodajte lozinke, omogućite nadzor tzv. tamnog weba (Dark Web) i automatski ispunite osobne podatke te podatke za plaćanje.
passwordManager.startProtect: Započnite sa zaštitom svojih mrežnih računa na jednostavan način.
passwordManager.discount: Korisnici tvrtke Lenovo ekskluzivno upotrebljavaju vrhunsku aplikaciju Dashlane tijekom 6 besplatnih mjeseci.
passwordManager.offer: Ponuda je dostupna samo za nove korisnike aplikacije Dashlane!
passwordManager.learnMoreAbout: <tag>Saznajte više</tag> o tome kako u potpunosti iskoristiti Dashlane
passwordManager.neverForget: Dashlane: nikada više ne zaboravite lozinku
passwordManager.whatIsDashLane: Dashlane je upravitelj lozinki i aplikacija za digitalnu zaštitu koja radi s vašim pretraživačem. Automatski sprema lozinke i osobne podatke, pamti sve za vas i sve sigurno pohranjuje. Dashlane isto tako analizira sigurnost vašeg korisničkog računa i pruža jednostavne načine za poboljšanje jačine vaše lozinke.
passwordManager.helpYou1: Zapamtiti neograničen broj korisničkih imena i lozinki.
passwordManager.helpYou2: Odmah se svugdje prijavite za besprijekorno pregledavanje
passwordManager.helpYou3: Sinkronizirajte uređaje da nikada ne biste ostali bez pristupa važnim računima
passwordManager.helpYou4: Poboljšajte internetsku zaštitu jednostavnim, djelotvornim savjetima
passwordManager.checkOutThisGuide: Upotrijebite Dashlane da biste se zaštitili na internetu dok istodobno štedite vrijeme i pošteđujete se frustracije. Kako biste pročitali detaljne upute o tome kako započeti, <tag>pogledajte ovaj vodič.</tag>
passwordManager.allowsYou1: Odmah se svugdje prijavite za besprijekorno pregledavanje-Sinkronizirajte uređaje da nikada ne biste ostali bez pristupa važnim računima
passwordManager.allowsYou2: Da pratite postoje li vaše osobne informacije na tamnom webu
passwordManager.allowsYou3: Da ostanete sigurni na nezaštićenim WiFi mrežama s ugrađenim VPN-om
passwordManager.allowsYou4: Da sigurno dijelite lozinke, a da ih ne otkrijete

windowsHello.signIn: Brza i sigurna prijava uz Windows Hello.
windowsHello.signInTitle: Brza i sigurna prijava uz Windows Hello
windowsHello.whyWindowsHelloDescription1: Značajka Windows Hello prijavu na PC čini lakšom i sigurnijom, a koristiti je možete i za Microsoftove aplikacije na internetu. Da biste počeli upotrebljavati Windows Hello, slijedite upute u nastavku.
windowsHello.visitAndRegister: Posjetite stranicu Windows Hello i registrirajte svoj otisak prsta.
windowsHello.visitInSettings: <tag> Posjetite Windows Hello</tag> u postavkama sustava
windowsHello.unlock: Upotrijebite Windows Hello da biste se prijavili na vaše osobno računalo i otključali ga dodirom prsta na senzoru.
windowsHello.startUsingWindowsHello: Počnite koristiti Windows Hello za prijavu u Microsoftove aplikacije kao što su Outlook, OneDrive, Office 365 i Xbox Live.
windowsHello.privacyPolicy: Pročitajte više o <tag>Pravilniku o zaštiti podataka</tag>
windowsHello.whyWindowsHelloDescription2: Windows Hello omogućava lakšu i sigurniju prijavu na vaše osobno računalo. Također, možete ga upotrebljavati za svoje mrežne Microsoft aplikacije. Da biste počeli upotrebljavati Windows Hello, slijedite upute u nastavku.
windowsHello.traditional: Tradicionalne lozinke mogu se ukrasti i koristiti za pristup vašem računu s bilo kojeg mjesta u svijetu. Sigurniji i prikladniji. Windows Hello sljedeća je generacija lozinki. Umjesto nesigurnih lozinki, za prijavu koristite čitač otiska prsta.

footer.title: Not finding what you are looking for?

question1.title: Back up and restore your files
question1.description:
Back up and restore your files
It's always good to have a backup. Keep copies of your files on another drive in case something happens to the originals.
Set up your backup
Select the Start button, select Settings > Update & security > Backup > Add a drive , and then choose an external drive or network location for your backups.
All set. Every hour, we'll back up everything in your user folder (C:\Users\username). To change which files get backed up or how often backups happen, go to More options.
Restore your files
If you're missing an important file or folder, here's how to get it back:
1. Type Restore files in the search box on the taskbar, and then select Restore your files with File History.
2. Look for the file you need, then use the arrows to see all its versions
3. When you find the version you want, select Restore to save it in its original location. To save it in a different place, press and hold (or right-click) Restore, select Restore to, and then choose a new location.

para1.line2: Keep copies of your files on another drive in case something happens to the originals.

para3.span2: Every hour, we'll back up everything in your user folder (C:\Users\username).

question2.title: How to refresh your PC
question2.description:
How to refresh your PC
Symptom
If your PC isn't performing as well as it once did, and you don't know why, you can refresh your PC without deleting any of your personal files or changing your settings. Windows can “refresh” your PC so it’s more like a fresh install without deleting your personal files.
Refresh your PC, Here is what will happen: your files and personalized settings won’t change
  • Your PC settings will be changed back to its defaults
  • Apps from windows store will be kept
  • Apps you installed from disc or website will be removed
  • A list of removed files will be saved on your desktop
Affected Brands
  • All Desktop and Laptops
Operation System
  • Windows 8, 8.1 & 10
Solution
  • Windows 8/8.1
    1. Tap or click Settings
    2. Tap or click Update and recovery
    3. Tap or click Recovery
      Under Refresh your PC without affecting your files, tap or click Get started.
    4. Click 'Next'.
    5. Click 'Refresh' to start the refresh process.
    6. Once the refresh process is done, you can find a Removed Apps list on the desktop
    7. You can find the removed apps while refreshing your system
  • Windows 10
    1. Search for refresh in the search tool available in the Start menu,
    2. Click on 'Refresh your PC without affecting your files' in the search results as shown below.
    3. Click on the Get started button just below the heading 'Refresh your PC without affecting your files' to start refreshing your Windows 10 PC.
Additional Information
In most cases, once you start to refresh your PC, it’ll finish on its own. However, if Windows needs missing files, you’ll be asked to insert recovery media, which is typically a DVD disc or thumb drive. If that happens, what you’ll need depends on your PC.
If you upgraded your PC to Windows 8.1 or Windows RT 8.1 with a DVD, use that disc. If you don’t have Windows 8.1 or Windows RT 8.1 media, contact Microsoft Support.

question3.title: How to know your machine's CPU
question3.description:
How to know your machine's CPU

Symptom

The terms 32-bit and 64-bit refer to the way a computer's processor (also called a CPU), handles information. The 64-bit version of Windows handles large amounts of random access memory (RAM) more effectively than a 32-bit system.

Affected Brands

The above symptom is associated with, but not limited to, the following systems:

  • All Desktop and Laptops

Operating System

  • Windows 7 , 8 , 10

Solution

Windows 7 or Vista

  1. Open System by clicking the Start button Picture of the Start button, right-clicking Computer, and then clicking Properties
  2. Under System, you can view the system type.

Windows 8 and Windows 10

Method 1: View the System window in Control Panel

  1. Swipe in from the right edge of the screen, and then tap Search. Or, if you are using a mouse, point to the lower-right corner of the screen, and then click Search.
  2. Type system in the search box, and then tap or click Settings.
  3. Tap or click System
  4. If you are running a 64-bit version of Windows 8, 64-bit Operating System is displayed in the System type field under the System heading. If you are running a 32-bit version of Windows 8, 32-bit Operating System is displayed in the System type field under the System heading.

Method 2: View the System Information window

  1. Swipe in from the right edge of the screen, and then tap Search. Or, if you are using a mouse, point to the lower-right corner of the screen, and then click Search.
  2. In the search box, type system information
  3. Tap or click System, tap or click System Information, and then click System Summary.
  4. If you are running a 64-bit version of Windows 8, x64-based PC is displayed in the System type field under the Item heading.

    If you are running a 32-bit version of Windows 8, x86-based PC is displayed in the System type field under the Item heading.

question4.title: Check your machine's battery use
question4.description:
Check your machine's battery use

Symptom

Windows 10 includes a new “Battery Use” screen that shows you what’s draining your laptop’s juice. That means it’ll tell you exactly what apps–both desktop and Windows 10 “universal” apps–are using too much power.

Affected Brands

  • Lenovo laptops, desktops

Affected Systems

  • All

Operationg System

  • Window 10

Solution

This feature is new in Windows 10, we need to find this feature first as it is not stored in your traditional control panel view, this feature is located in the new “Settings” app


A. Find the Battery Use Screen

1. Click or Tap the “Settings” option from the start menu

2. In Settings select “System”and then select “Battery saver.”

3. Click or tap the “Battery use” link under this heading to see more details.

B. Analyze Your Power Usage

4 You can change to make the battery use screen to display battery use from last 24 hours to last 48 hours or last from last week

5 “System,” “Display,” and “ Wi-Fi” percentages. This shows how much battery power has been used by system processes, the display,

6 The “In use” and “Background” options show how much power is used by applications while you’re using them, compared to applications running in the background.

7 If apps are using power in the background, you can click or tap the “Change background app settings” link and configure apps to not run in the background. This only works for universal Windows 10 apps.

8 Scroll down further and you will see a list of applications, this is considered as the most useful section of this feature. It will display a list of the apps have used battery power in that period, and show you what percentage of your battery power each app has used

question5.title: Use your PC like a tablet
question5.description:
Use your PC like a tablet

Tablet mode makes Windows more intuitive and easier to use when you have a touchscreen device.

Use tablet mode

To turn on tablet mode, select action center on the taskbar, then select Tablet mode .

Note

To find out if your device can automatically turn on tablet mode, search for your device on the manufacturer's website. Support for this feature depends on the hardware, the driver that's installed, and how the device was set up by the manufacturer.

In tablet mode, apps open full screen, giving you more space to work. To close an app, drag it to the bottom of the screen.

Tip

The taskbar is available when your PC is in tablet mode, but you can hide it if you want more room on the screen. Select the Start button, select Settings > System > Tablet mode , then turn on Automatically hide the taskbar in tablet mode. To see the hidden taskbar, swipe up from the bottom of the screen, or use your mouse to hover there.

Use two apps simultaneously

To use two apps side by side in tablet mode, drag an open app down and to the side. You'll see where it'll snap, and you'll see any open apps next to it.

In this view, you can also:

  • Use the shared edge between two snapped apps to resize both apps at the same time.
  • Open a new app from task view—select Task view on the taskbar, select an app, then drag it to one side to snap it into your divided screen.
  • Use the back button on the taskbar to go back in an app, or to open an app that you were using before.

question6.title: Get to know Cortona, your personal assistant
question6.description:
Get to know Cortana, your personal assistant

What is Cortana?

Cortana is your digital agent. She'll help you get things done.

The more you use Cortana, the more personalized your experience will be.

To get started, type a question in the search box, or select the microphone and talk to Cortana. (Typing works for all types of PCs, but you need a mic to talk.)

If you’re not sure what to say, you’ll see suggestions on your lock screen, and in Cortana home when you select the search box on the taskbar.

  1. Home 2. Notebook 3. Settings 4. Feedback

Here are some things Cortana can do for you:

  • Give you reminders based on time, places, or people.
  • Track packages, teams, interests, and flights.
  • Send emails and texts.
  • Manage your calendar and keep you up to date.
  • Create and manage lists.
  • Chit chat and play games.
  • Find facts, files, places, and info.
  • Open any app on your system.

Try this: Set a reminder

One of the things Cortana can do is to give you reminders. She can remind you to do things based on time, places, or even people.

For example, type or say, 'Remind me to congratulate Tanya the next time she calls.'

The reminder will appear when you get a call from Tanya.

Extra bonus—if you have a Windows phone or Cortana for iPhone or Android, you can set Cortana to sync notifications between your PC and phone.

Hey Cortana?

Set Cortana to hear you anytime you say 'Hey Cortana.' Select the search box on the taskbar to open Cortana home. Then select Settings and turn on Let Cortana respond to 'Hey Cortana.'

Note

Cortana is only available in certain countries/regions, and some Cortana features might not be available everywhere.
question6.para1: Cortana is your digital agent. She'll help you get things done.
question6.para2: The more you use Cortana, the more personalized your experience will be.
question6.para3: To get started, type a question in the search box, or select the microphone  and talk to Cortana. (Typing works for all types of PCs, but you need a mic to talk.)
question6.para4: If you’re not sure what to say, you’ll see suggestions on your lock screen, and in Cortana home when you select the search box on the taskbar.
question6.para6: Here are some things Cortana can do for you:

bulletset1.span1: Give you reminders based on time, places, or people.
bulletset1.span2: Track packages, teams, interests, and flights.
bulletset1.span4: Manage your calendar and keep you up to date.
bulletset1.span7: Find facts, files, places, and info.
bulletset1.span8: Open any app on your system.

question6.para7: One of the things Cortana can do is to give you reminders. She can remind you to do things based on time, places, or even people.
question6.para8: For example, type or say, “Remind me to congratulate Tanya the next time she calls.”
question6.para9: The reminder will appear when you get a call from Tanya.
question6.para10: Extra bonus—if you have a Windows phone or Cortana for iPhone or Android, you can set Cortana to sync notifications between your PC and phone.

para11.span1: Set Cortana to hear you anytime you say “Hey Cortana.” Select the search box on the taskbar to open Cortana home.

question6.para13: Cortana is only available in certain countries/regions, and some Cortana features might not be available everywhere.

welcometutorial.description: Vantage vam olakšava ažuriranje upravljačkih programa, pokretanje dijagnostike, traženje podrške i saznavanje više informacija o uređaju. Brzo prilagodite svoje iskustvo i pronađite korisne informacije prilagođene vašim potrebama
welcometutorial.bullets1: Pogledajte status sustava pomoću nadzorne ploče Vantage.
welcometutorial.bullets2: Savjetnik za sigurnost tvrtke olakšava upravljanje sigurnosnim značajkama
welcometutorial.bullets3: Automatska ažuriranja pomažu vašem uređaju ostati u savršenom stanju
welcometutorial.subtitle1: U koju svrhu ćete koristiti uređaj?
welcometutorial.subtitle2: Recite nam više o svojim interesima
welcometutorial.privacytitle: Pomozite nam poboljšati kvalitetu ove aplikacije omogućavanjem prikupljanja anonimnih statističkih podataka o korištenju.
welcometutorial.privacypolicy: Pravilnik o zaštiti privatnosti tvrtke Lenovo

settings.settingsDescription: Na stranici postavki možete odabrati uključivanje / isključivanje obavijesti o porukama na temelju kategorija Vantageove poruke. Napominjemo da čak i ako su sve kategorije poruka onemogućene, još uvijek možete povremeno primati ključnu poruku sustava Vantage kada je to potrebno.
settings.appFeaturesDescription: Poruke koje se odnose na System Update, članke i ostale važne značajke.
settings.marketingDescription: Promotivne poruke uključujući posebne ponude tvrtke Lenovo.
settings.actionTriggeredDescription: Poruke koje pokreću korisnici odabirom postavki kao što su automatsko instaliranje kritičnih / preporučenih ažuriranja.
settings.usageStatisticsDescription: Slanje anonimnih statističkih podataka o korištenju tvrtki Lenovo.
settings.settingsNotes: Sve postavke na ovoj stranici trebat će korisnici da se ponovno pokrenu kako bi stupili na snagu.
